title: Everything the Light Touches with Vera Ahiyya
description:
Joe is once again joined by the Tutu Teacher herself, Vera Ahiyya. They chat about all things teacher life including the importance of librarians, dealing with bureaucracy, having important conversations in the classroom, and Vera's incredible and important book, 'You Have a Voice.'
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
